feed.title: SAP Community - PLM EAM/Plant Maintenance
feed.subtitle: PLM EAM/Plant Maintenance Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: How to upload Classification Characteristic Values to Document Info Record
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

the API Documents | Document Info Record | SAP Business Accelerator Hub  allows the creation of document info records using an OData Service. 

The API also allows the retrieval of the classification of a document info record (" Item node that contains classification values. Only Read operation is supported ")

We currently have an option to create the document info record and upload/link attachments via an API via an connected system. But the maintenance of the of classification of the document and valuation of the characteristics must be done manual in the system. 

Is there also an API to maintain values to a classification characteristic? 

Thank you for the help.

Florian

entry.title: Is it safe to activate Business Function LOG_EAM_CI_7 in a production environment?
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

We are planning to activate the Business Function LOG_EAM_CI_7 (Enterprise Asset Management Part 7) via standard configuration in SPRO.

Before proceeding, we would like to know if activating this Business Function in the production system — or in any environment — could potentially impact other existing processes or custom developments.

We are aware that once activated, this Business Function cannot be reversed, except by restoring a system snapshot or backup. Therefore, we are being extra cautious.

Does anyone have experience activating this BF? Are there any known issues, side effects, or dependencies we should be aware of?

Thanks in advance for your guidance and insights!

entry.title: Report Similar To IP19 & IP24 For Unscheduled Maintenance Plan
entry.content:
Hi Team,

we need a report similar to IP24 for unscheduled maintenance plans with 

1. Order type

2. Plant

3. Planner group

4. Scheduled/unscheduled

5. start date

6. call horizon

7. Scheduling indicator for MPLAN

8. scheduling period

9. cycle

10. unit

11. Total calls to be generated from all plans - tilldate- Start date> Cycle > call horizon> scheduling period

12. Total calls to be generated from all plans - till scheduling period end - Start date> Cycle > call horizon> scheduling period

13. Total order generated till date - Start date> Cycle > call horizon> scheduling period

14. Total order generated till scheduling period's end - Start date> Cycle > call horizon> scheduling period

User want REPORT similar to IP19 & IP24 for forecasting orders(calls) that will be generated from unscheduled MPLANS before scheduling .How we can develop the report through tables MHIO MHIS MPLA etc , also need logic for scheduling indicator changes & impact over future calls.

Thanks In Advance.

Ali Shehpar

entry.title: How to Create Refurbishment Order for Equipment in S/4HANA Public Cloud 2502
entry.content:
Scenario to Raise in SAP Community or Support Ticket:

Dear SAP Experts,

We are trying to implement the Equipment Refurbishment Process in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud (2502), where used equipment is sent to an external vendor for repair and is brought back to stock after refurbishment.

We want to follow the standard process using a Refurbishment Maintenance Order, but in the cloud version, we are unsure how to integrate it with a Purchase Requisition and Purchase Order, and how to track the equipment lifecycle properly.

🔧 Business Process Requirement (End-to-End):

  1. Create a Refurbishment Maintenance Order (Order type YA04 or equivalent).

  2. Assign the Equipment in the maintenance order (serialized or batch-managed).

  3. System should generate a Purchase Requisition automatically from the refurbishment order, indicating that external vendor service is needed.

  4. Convert the Purchase Requisition to a Purchase Order for the external vendor.

  5. The PO should reflect the equipment reference and capture cost center or order information.

  6. Send the equipment to the vendor (e.g., via movement type for stock provided to vendor).

  7. After external maintenance, perform Goods Receipt (GRN) against the PO.

  8. Confirm and settle the maintenance order — updating cost, equipment status, and technical history.

💬 Specific Questions:

  1. How do we configure and use the Refurbishment Order type in S/4HANA Public Cloud?

  2. Is it possible to automatically generate the Purchase Requisition from the maintenance order, as is standard in on-premise?

  3. Can we link the equipment directly to the PR or PO in Public Cloud for tracking?

  4. What is the correct way to send the equipment to the vendor? Is there a standard movement type or workaround supported?

  5. How should the Goods Receipt be performed to reflect the return of the refurbished equipment?

  6. Can we ensure that costs are captured and posted back to the Refurbishment Order correctly?

  7. What are the restrictions or alternate methods in Public Cloud compared to On-Premise (e.g., lack of IW81/IW82, or limited movement types)?

  8. Should we use split valuation (e.g., new vs. refurbished) to differentiate stock?

🧾 Objective:

We are looking to implement a complete refurbishment cycle in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud, involving:

  • Maintenance Order

  • Purchase Requisition (Auto or Manual)

  • Purchase Order

  • Equipment tracking

  • Stock movement to vendor

  • GRN

  • Cost settlement

  • Equipment lifecycle update

🛠️ System Info:

  • SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud (2502)

  • Modules: EAM (PM), MM, FI

  • Equipment: Serialized or batch-managed

  • Order Type: YA04 or relevant

Any configuration steps, best practices, or supported standard process in Public Cloud would be highly appreciated.

Thank you in advance!
Pranav Bhusare
SAP MM/WM/EAM Consultant

entry.title: SAP message IW172 during SAP PM work order creation with IW31 tcode
entry.content:
I am getting an error while creating a PM work order. After i enter the WBS element and click Save, I get the message, Error occurred during budget check, see cost protocol. SAP message IW172

How do I resolve this error?

SAP EAM Work Order  PLM Enterprise Asset Management (EAM)/Plant Maintenance (PM)

entry.title: Wrong plan/call date in a maintenance plan counter
entry.content:
Hi,

For a counter maintenance plan, the next schedule had to be 5th May 2025 but SAP has called it called on 5th May 2026 and the work order has been generated for it.

I have checked the measuring documents in the equipment and the dates there are 2025.

What could be the reason for this incorrect call? How do I resolve this?

Thank you. 

SAP EAM Work Order PLM Enterprise Asset Management (EAM)/Plant Maintenance (PM)

entry.title: Under what scenario the valuation category the external labor is populated in work order cost
entry.content:
Hi Team,

Can you please let me know under what scenario the valuation category the external labor is populated in work order cost. In the cost element we see contract labor 3P and the cost is getting reflected in actual cost section.

Regards,

Jaya

entry.title: IW66 search with assembly number shows no result
entry.content:
Hello,

when I use IW66 an select no search criterias, I got a search result (see screenshot1 in the attachment). When I try to search only with the assembly number, I got the message "No objects were selected" (screenshot3 in the attachment).

Does anyone knows why the search with assembly number ist not working?.

Best regards,

Stefan

entry.title: SAP Best practice not available after Upgrade to S/4 AHAN 2023
entry.content:
We have upgraded to S/4 2023 Private cloud. However new sap best practices along with sample data ( New Order type.,Notification type  for Corrective, Emergency etc) are not available. How to get them in system.

 

BH1Corrective Maintenance
BH2Emergency Maintenance
BJ2Preventive Maintenance
4HIProactive Maintenance
4HHReactive Maintenance

entry.title: IK34- Collective Entry of Measurement Document
entry.content:
Hi All ,

Greetings , 

We have created measurement entry list & now need to enter the collective reading using t-code IK34 . However, user need to enter reading one by one for each measuring point . Instead of this, user want to copy the reading from excel sheet . Is it possible to copy counter reading from excel sheet ?

Thanking you in advance .

Best Regards 

Mohammed

Jaya

entry.title: Work cost not calculated for control key PM03
entry.content:
Hi Team,

We have an operation with control Key PM03, for that operation we have done time entry in CAT2 and CAT9. The actual work maintained in CATSDB table is being populated in the actual work field in work order operation but the cost are not reflected. Why so?

Regards,

Jaya

Could you help me understand the key differences, advantages, or use cases for each?

Regards ,

Ashu

entry.title: Data Source for Change History of Work Order Object List and Functional Location of each operation
entry.content:
Hi,
 
We are trying to retrieve change history of Object List under Work order and function location assigned to each operation, and we have checked  CDHDR/CDPOS (changelog in SAP),  but  found no relevant change records for object list - functional location.
 
We are wondering
  • Are there any other sources available (e.g., standard tables, CDS views, APIs, etc) that contain this type of change history?
  • Or is CDHDR/CDPOS the only option, but change tracking must be properly configured in SAP.
Any guidance on how to retrieve this kind of change information would be greatly appreciated.  
 
Thanks!

entry.title: Restrict the app F2175 Find Maintenance Order to show orders that an user is responsible for
entry.content:
Hello Everyone - I would like to restrict the orders displayed in the app, F2175 (Find Maintenance Order). I searched in SAP Community and could not find helpful information. Any pointers on how this can be achieved would be of great help.

Steps:

Access the app from launchpad

Clicking on the GO button should display only orders that I am responsible for.

I know we can do "Adapt Filters" and restrict on our personnel number. But this is a user specific setting. I want to restrict based on "Personnel Number" entered.

Thanks,

Phani

entry.title: Reported By doesn't show all users in Request Maintenance App (F1511)
entry.content:
Hello,

When we try to create a "Request Maintenance" using the Request Maintenance App (F1511), my user does not appear in the "Reported By" field. I do have a user account in the S/4HANA environment. We have tried creating an HR Master Record (PA30) and also set up a Business Partner (BP), but none of these steps have resolved the issue.

We are performing this validation in our development system as part of a new EAM project implementation. In the development environment, HR Master data is not synchronized with SuccessFactors, so we do not have access to all HR Master records. For this reason, we are attempting to create users manually.

Any guidance or pointers on how to resolve this would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you,
Phani

entry.title: Derivation of Profitcenter in PM-Order
entry.content:
When creating a PM-Order the Profit center is taken from Material master. When a responsible Cost center is entered it should overwrite Profit center from Material master with Profit center of responsible Cost center. But it doesn't work.
